auth.title: Government of Jharkhand
auth.subtitle: Civic Issue Reporting Portal
auth.description: Report civic issues directly to the government for faster resolution
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters

report.formSubtitle: Help us serve you better by providing detailed information
report.descriptionSubtitle: Please provide a detailed description of the issue you're reporting
report.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the issue in detail... Include location landmarks, time noticed, severity, etc.
report.photoSubtitle: A clear photo helps government officials understand and prioritize your issue
report.submitNote: 🔒 Your report will be securely transmitted to the appropriate government department
report.validationError: Please fill all fields & attach an image.
report.networkError: No internet connection. Please check your network.
report.duplicateMessage:
Similar {{category}} issue found nearby ({{similarity}}% match).

Do you still want to report this issue?
report.submitting: Submitting your report to Jharkhand Government...
report.successMessage:
Your civic issue has been reported to the Government of Jharkhand!

📋 Category: {{category}}
🎯 AI Confidence: {{confidence}}%
⚡ Priority Score: {{priority}}/100
🎯 Impact Score: {{impact}}/100

🏛️ Your report ID will be provided via email for tracking.
report.locationPermissionError: Please enable location access in device settings
report.locationFallbackError: Could not get your location. Please try again.
report.cameraPermissionError: Camera permission is required to take photos of civic issues for reporting to the government.
report.cameraError: Unable to access camera. Please try again.

profile.aboutText1: The Government of Jharkhand is committed to transparent and efficient governance. This digital platform enables citizens to report civic issues directly to the appropriate government departments for faster resolution.
profile.aboutText2: 🌐 Part of the Digital India initiative, this app represents our commitment to leveraging technology for better citizen services.
profile.logoutNote: Your data is securely stored and will be available when you return.
profile.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout from Jharkhand Civic Portal?
profile.logoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
profile.logoutError: Failed to logout. Please try again.
profile.contactMessage: How would you like to contact the Jharkhand Government support team?
profile.rateMessage: Help us improve the Jharkhand Civic Portal by rating our app in the store.
profile.rateThankYou: This would open the app store for rating.

language.title: 🌐 Language Settings
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language
language.changeError: Failed to change language. Please try again.
